name: Cleo Springs
description:
A young girl gets sucked in a game after playing it for hours and avoiding her upcoming biology test. In order to get back the village people need her to capture the evil wolf Maldrid, when she does they will return her to earth. However, she discovers that the beautiful Cleo Springs may not be all that it appears to be, and the question arises: Will she be able to return home?

I used a default Gb studios background , actors and assests - 

https://www.gbstudio.dev

https://materialfuture.itch.io/gameboy-assets
